revised_title: Dislocations in Pulsed and Continuous Wave Diffraction Patterns
tldr: The article explores the relationship between the fixed dislocation lines of a monochromatic wave pattern and the moving dislocation lines of a pulse pattern. It studies the dislocation trajectories and their connection to continuous wave diffraction patterns. The authors provide a two-dimensional model system to demonstrate the behavior of dislocations in pulses and continuous waves, and discuss the implications for remote sensing systems.
